p: A strength of the NobBS approach is that it only requires historical data on case reporting, which makes it immediately adaptable in a variety of disease systems that may not have other real-time covariates to inform the nowcasting model (e.g. search engine queries, weather data). However, if these covariates are available, it would be possible to include them directly in the log-linear model ( Materials and Methods) as additional predictors, as demonstrated by Bastos et al [ 16].
